definitions: the quality of belonging or relating uniquely to a particular subject

examples.text: the statement of special educational needs lacked specificity
the historical specificities of the texts cannot be overlooked

shortDefinitions: quality of belonging to particular subject

definitions: the narrowness of the range of substances with which an antibody or other agent acts or is effective

examples.text: the specificity of the antibody was checked

shortDefinitions: narrowness of range of substances with which antibody or other agent acts or is effective

definitions: the extent to which a diagnostic test is specific for a particular condition, trait, etc.

examples.text: the sensitivity of paramedics for diagnosis of stroke was 66%, with a specificity of 98%

shortDefinitions: extent to which test is specific for particular condition
